subtitles.text: Yes, I am now in a haunted house with an altitude of 3000 meters! Yeah!

We, Clanpop, are going to have a one-on-one live performance at Shinjuku Lenny on Sunday, April 23rd!

From September to December

And one more thing, on Thursday, December 28th
